mapper.select: SELECT Q.NO ,Q.TITLE ,Q.CONTENT ,Q.WRITER_NO ,Q.CATEGORY_NO ,Q.ENROLL_DATE ,Q.DEL_YN ,Q.ANSWER_YN ,C.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME ,M.NICK AS writerName FROM QNA Q LEFT OUTER JOIN QNA_CATEGORY C ON (Q.CATEGORY_NO=C.NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (Q.WRITER_NO=M.NO)

SELECT C.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME , M.NICK , Q.TITLE , Q.CONTENT , QA.CONTENT AS QN_CONTENT FROM QNA Q JOIN QNA_CATEGORY C ON (C.NO = Q.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.NO = Q.WRITER_NO) JOIN QNA_AN QA ON (QA.Q_NO = Q.NO) WHERE Q.NO= #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_AN ( NO , ANCATEGORY_NO , CONTENT , WRITER_NO , DEL_YN , MODIFY_DATE , ENROLL_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_QNA_AN_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ancategoryNo} , #{content} , #{writerNo} , 'N' , NULL , SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA_AN SET CONTENT = COALESCE(#{content} , content) , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE QNA_AN SET MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE , DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{num}
